001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core.config;
002
003import java.util.Map;
004
005import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
006import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta.Required;
007
008public record ClimateConfig(
009    @Nullable Long seed,
010    boolean useWorldSeed,
011    Noise temperatureNoise,
012    Noise humidityNoise,
013    Factors factors,
014    @Required Map<String, Season> seasons
015) {
016    public record Noise(
017        double timeFactor,
018        double scale,
019        int octaves,
020        double lacunarity,
021        double persistence
022    ) {}
023
024    public record Factors(
025        double dayTimeAmplitude
026    ) {}
027}
